title: You are about to lose your Photoshop cards.
content:
Dear Designers;

Aside from birds flying over snow, almost nothing in the real world floats magically over a clean white background. Stop Photoshopping every damned thing you can into a silhouette. Just because you know how to create a mask with the pen tool and tweak it with your Wacom tablet doesnâ€™t mean you should. Tell the client to stop being a cheapass and hire a Photographer to shoot against something interesting.
author: James Puckett
